1{-# LANGUAGE FlexibleInstances #-}
2{-# LANGUAGE PatternSynonyms #-}
3{-# LANGUAGE ViewPatterns #-}
4{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
5
6-- | Token tree for sieve pattern. 
7
8module Koshucode.Baala.Subtext.Sieve.Tree
9  ( SivTree,
10    sivTrees,
11    SivExpr,
12    ToSivExpr (..),
13    toSivExprOr,
14    sivMatch,
15    sivMatchExpr,
16  ) where
17
18import Prelude hiding (seq, min, max)
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture               as O
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                   as B
21import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Subtext.Match          as S
22import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Subtext.Operator       as S
23import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Subtext.Sieve.Token    as S
24import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.Message           as Msg
25
26-- | Sieve tree.
27type SivTree t = B.CodeTree S.SivBracket S.SivToken t
28
29-- | Parse sieve token list.
30--
31--   >>> mapM_ B.printTree O.# B.abortLeft (sivTrees $ S.sivTokens "foo{ba_}[0-9]baz_")
32--   - SivText "foo"
33--   > SivRepeat 0 Just (SivOpen (SivRepeat 0), SivClose (SivRepeat 0))
34--     - SivText "ba"
35--     - SivKey SivAnyChar
36--   > SivOption Just (SivOpen SivOption, SivClose SivOption)
37--     - SivText "0"
38--     - SivKey SivRange
39--     - SivText "9"
40--   - SivText "baz_"
41--
42sivTrees :: [S.SivToken t] -> B.Ab [SivTree t]
43sivTrees = B.codeTrees bracket B.BracketNone where
44    bracket (S.SivOpen  b) = B.BracketOpen  b
45    bracket (S.SivClose b) = B.BracketClose b
46    bracket _              = B.BracketNone
47
48-- | Sieve expression.
49type SivExpr = S.CharExpr
50
51-- | Convert to sieve expression.
52class ToSivExpr a where
53    toSivExpr :: a -> B.Ab SivExpr
54
55-- | Convert to sieve expression with replacement.
56toSivExprOr :: (ToSivExpr a) => SivExpr -> a -> SivExpr
57toSivExprOr e0 a = case toSivExpr a of
58                     Right e -> e
59                     Left _  -> e0
60
61instance ToSivExpr SivExpr where
62    toSivExpr = Right
63
64instance ToSivExpr [S.SivToken String] where
65    toSivExpr = sivExpr O.#. sivTrees
66
67instance ToSivExpr String where
68    toSivExpr = toSivExpr . S.sivTokens
69
70-- | Convet sieve tree to sieve expression.
71sivExpr :: [SivTree String] -> B.Ab SivExpr
72sivExpr = top where
73    top ts = do e <- seq ts
74                Right $ S.seq [e, S.end]
75
76    seq ts = do es <- expr ts
77                Right $ S.seq es
78
79    expr (Lt a : Lr : Lt b : ts)
80                             = case (O.tCut2 a, O.tCut2 b) of 
81                                 (Just (a0, Nothing), Just (b0, Nothing))
82                                   -> S.to a0 b0 <:> ts
83                                 _ -> Msg.adlib "Malformed range"
84    expr (Lt t : ts)         = S.equal t     <:> ts
85    expr (Lat : ts)          = S.many S.any  <:> ts
86    expr (Lac : ts)          = S.any         <:> ts
87
88    expr (Bg [Lat] : ts)     = repAny S.min 0 ts
89    expr (Bg xs : ts)        = do e <- seq xs
90                                  e <:> ts
91
92    expr (Br n [Lat] : ts)   = repAny S.min n ts
93    expr (Br n [Lac] : ts)   = repAny S.min n ts
94    expr (Br n xs : ts)      = do e <- seq xs
95                                  S.min n e <:> ts
96
97    expr (Bo [Lat] : ts)     = repAny S.max 1 ts
98    expr (Bo [Lac] : ts)     = repAny S.max 1 ts
99    expr (Bo xs : ts)        = do e <- seq xs
100                                  S.maybe e <:> ts
101
102    expr []                  = Right []
103    expr _                   = Msg.adlib "Unknown sieve"
104
105    e <:> ts        = do es <- expr ts
106                         Right $ e : es
107
108    repAny f n []   = Right [f n S.any]
109    repAny f n ts   = do es <- expr ts
110                         Right $ f n (S.anyNot $ S.seq es) : es
111
112pattern L tok     <- B.TreeL tok
113pattern B b xs    <- B.TreeB b _ xs
114
115pattern Lt t      <- L (S.SivText t)
116pattern Lr        <- L (S.SivKey S.SivRange)
117pattern Lat       <- L (S.SivKey S.SivAnyText)
118pattern Lac       <- L (S.SivKey S.SivAnyChar)
119
120pattern Bg   xs   <- B S.SivGroup xs
121pattern Br n xs   <- B (S.SivRepeat n) xs
122pattern Bo   xs   <- B S.SivOption xs
123
124-- | Test sieve pattern matches text.
125--
126--   >>> sivMatch "foo(*).k" O.<#> ["foo.k", "foo.hs", "foobar.k", "bar.k"]
127--   Right [True, True, False]
128--
129sivMatch :: (ToSivExpr siv) => siv -> String -> B.Ab Bool
130sivMatch siv t = do e <- toSivExpr siv
131                    Right $ sivMatchExpr e t
132
133-- | Test sieve pattern matches text.
134sivMatchExpr :: SivExpr -> String -> Bool
135sivMatchExpr e t = case S.matchExpr e t of
136                     Just _  -> True
137                     Nothing -> False
138
